text: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

translation.en: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger
translation.id: Bahkan Aku telah memberikan kenikmatan hidup kepada mereka dan nenek moyang mereka sampai kebenaran (Alquran) datang kepada mereka bersama seorang Rasul yang memberi penjelasan
